Companion is a digital design studio that partners with you to create new realities. 

We aim to enhance the lives of people & the world around us by designing tools, services and products that inspire, entertain and create a better future.

Whether you have the seed of an idea or you have been there and done it before, we work with you to plan for now and the future.

We can work as an extension of you, or as an autonomous group. We prefer long-term relationships, so we tend to speak our mind openly as after all, your interests are our interests.

Every digital project is different and needs a flexible approach, so we focus on finding the most appropriate solutions for you, rather than trying to have you jump through hoops.

We believe the best digital experiences aren't an afterthought. We like to be involved from the beginning, planning, diving deep and working out where the most value can be added.

Having fun and playing is the best way to create. That’s why we don’t do free pitches, overwork our team or embrace the burnout culture of the creative industry. Sorry, it’s not fun.

Instead we partner with people that share our values: openness, curiosity, togetherness and a desire to do better for the people & world around us.

If you’re interested in working with us then message hello@companion.studio and we can chat.
